title: fps drop when using mechanical keyboard
body:
So, recently i got new mechanical keyboard, i used to play league of legends on my laptops integrated keyboard, but since i started using mechanical keyboard my fps started to drop drastically when i hold tab for couple seconds or just spam keys...
I tried to connect my keyboard to a different usb ports but it didn't work..
I tried disabling my keyboard LED lights still didn't work.
If you have any ideas why this could be happening , please let me know.

replies.body: I haven't heard of a keyboard causing fps issue, that's really weird.  What happens if you try another keyboard entirely?  There could also be drivers for your keyboard, that could potentially contribute.  See if there are any that can be updated, and run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide as well to help rule out other possibilities.  Test it in a custom game and let me know if that helps.

When i use my integrated keyboard on laptop i get barely get any fps drops it works fine, but when i use mechanical keyboard it just drops insanely fast. I also tried to reinstall keyboard drivers didn't work...

Thanks for the info!  Were you able to run through the steps in the fps guide?  Make sure to do that, but if the issue persists then reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can dig into this with you directly.
No worries, i fixed my problem. Thanks, for your help :)
